name: Space peasant vs Space-hungry
description:
Two space peasants try to defend their farm from space animals who try to eat their reserve. To do so, they need to give them apples before they reach their reserve.

One of the peasant (Player 1) throws apples at the animals while the other one (Player 2) has to pick the apples which “grow” on the field.

The goal is to “feed” the animals that are moving towards the bottom of the screen.

To feed them Player 1 has to throw apples at them using Space bar. If the apple thrown reach an animal, the animal will go the opposite way and flee to the top of the screen. Player 1 has a limit amount of ammunition so he shouldn’t spoil them. To gain more ammunition, Player 2 must pick apples that randomly spawn during the game.

If an animal reaches the bottom of the screen, it will directly “eat” 5 apples from the food reserve, which also corresponds to the remaining “ammunitions” for Player 1.

Players lost the game when an animal eat all the remaining apples from the food reserve.

There is no way to win the game, you can simply try to postpone the "Game Over".

Player 1 can move from left to right only, using keys A and D, and shoot apples using Space Bar.

Player 2 can move in all direction using directional arrows, must pick the apples that randomly spawn in the game. If it is hit by an animal, Player 2 is going to be immobilized for a few seconds.
